p: On the other hand, the essential oil obtained by hydrodistillation, very low in phenolic compound (8.89 mg EAG/g), has the lowest antioxidant activity, with an IC 50 value of 3681.49 ± 69.33 µg/mL. Polyphenols are known to have a high capacity to entrapment free radicals from the presence of hydroxyl substituents in their aromatic structure [ 39].
